    • comeToStop

      public boolean comeToStop(float rate)
      Description copied from class: GravityEntityController
      Stops the entity on the horizontal axis at a defined rate as a divisor.
      Overrides:
      comeToStop in class GravityEntityController
      Parameters:
      rate - Is the division rate of the velocity. A lower rate results in a quicker stop, vice versa.
      Returns:
      true if the entity has reached a velocity.x of 0
